languages.text: {n}На лице Эвейна мелькает и тут же пропадает улыбка.{/n} "Кажется, вам уже не раз задали этот вопрос. Или вы ожидаете, что вас им завалят в будущем. Я ни о чем не спросил, потому что боялся быть навязчивым или бестактным. Хотя, признаться, умираю от любопытства".

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Эвейна мелькает и тут же пропадает улыбка.{/n} "Кажется, вам уже не раз задали этот вопрос. Или вы ожидаете, что вас им завалят в будущем. Я ни о чем не спросил, потому что боялся быть навязчивым или бестактным. Хотя, признаться, умираю от любопытства".

traits.locale_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already asked you that question. Or perhaps you expect to hear it more times than you would like in the future. I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive or tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already asked you that question. Or perhaps you expect to hear it more times than you would like in the future. I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive or tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already posed you that question. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

{n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

languages.text: {n}Evayne esboza una breve sonrisa. {/n} «Imagino que ya le han formulado esa pregunta varias veces. O quizá espera que le aborden con tales interrogantes en el futuro. Si le digo la verdad, no he preguntado porque temía pecar de indiscreto y poco delicado. Pero, en realidad, me muero por saberlo».
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne esboza una breve sonrisa. {/n} «Imagino que ya le han formulado esa pregunta varias veces. O quizá espera que le aborden con tales interrogantes en el futuro. Si le digo la verdad, no he preguntado porque temía pecar de indiscreto y poco delicado. Pero, en realidad, me muero por saberlo».

languages.text: {n}Ein kurzlebiges Lächeln huscht über Evaynes Miene.{/n} "Diese Frage haben Euch vermutlich schon viele gestellt. Oder vielleicht erwartet Ihr, in Zukunft auf derlei Fragen antworten zu müssen. Offen gestanden habe ich nicht gefragt, weil ich Sorge hatte, übergriffig und taktlos zu wirken. Doch ehrlich gesagt würde ich es für mein Leben gerne erfahren."
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein kurzlebiges Lächeln huscht über Evaynes Miene.{/n} "Diese Frage haben Euch vermutlich schon viele gestellt. Oder vielleicht erwartet Ihr, in Zukunft auf derlei Fragen antworten zu müssen. Offen gestanden habe ich nicht gefragt, weil ich Sorge hatte, übergriffig und taktlos zu wirken. Doch ehrlich gesagt würde ich es für mein Leben gerne erfahren."

languages.text: {n}Un sourire éphémère passe sur le visage d'Evayne.{/n} « J'imagine qu'un certain nombre de gens vous ont déjà posé cette question. À moins que vous ne vous attendiez à l'entendre dans les semaines qui viennent ? Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne vous ai rien demandé pour ne pas paraître trop curieux et indélicat. Mais à dire vrai... Oui, j'aimerais beaucoup savoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire éphémère passe sur le visage d'Evayne.{/n} « J'imagine qu'un certain nombre de gens vous ont déjà posé cette question. À moins que vous ne vous attendiez à l'entendre dans les semaines qui viennent ? Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne vous ai rien demandé pour ne pas paraître trop curieux et indélicat. Mais à dire vrai... Oui, j'aimerais beaucoup savoir. »

languages.text: {n}艾维尼脸上闪过一抹短暂的微笑。{/n}“我猜已经有不少人这么问过您了，或者说，您也预料到了今后会有人问您这个问题。老实说，我之所有没有问出口，是因为我担心这样的问题不合时宜，但说实话，我真的很想知道原因。”
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼脸上闪过一抹短暂的微笑。{/n}“我猜已经有不少人这么问过您了，或者说，您也预料到了今后会有人问您这个问题。老实说，我之所有没有问出口，是因为我担心这样的问题不合时宜，但说实话，我真的很想知道原因。”

languages.text: {n}エヴァインの顔に、つかの間の笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「もう何人にもその質問をされたんだろう。あるいは、これからそういう質問をされる予感があるんだろうね。実を言うと、出しゃばった無神経な男だと思われるのが怖くて聞かなかったんだ。だが正直言えば、心底気になってるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインは短く笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「もう何人にもその質問をされたんじゃないだろうか。それか、これからそういう質問をされる予感があるんだろうね。実を言うと、出しゃばった無神経な男だと思われるのが怖くて聞かなかったんだ。でも正直、心底気になるよ」
{n}エヴァインの顔に、つかの間の笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「もう何人にもその質問をされたんだろう。あるいは、これからそういう質問をされる予感があるんだろうね。実を言うと、出しゃばった無神経な男だと思われるのが怖くて聞かなかったんだ。だが正直言えば、心底気になってるよ」

languages.text: {n}Evayne'in yüzünde anlık bir gülümseme belirip kayboluyor.{/n} "Anladığım kadarıyla birkaç kişi bu soruyu size yöneltmiş bile. Belki de gelecekte bu tür suallerle karşılaşmayı bekliyorsunuz. Dürüst olmak gerekirse densizlik ve patavatsızlık etmekten korktuğum için sormadım ama açıkçası bilmek için can atıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A short-lived smile flashes across Evayne's face.{/n} "I gather more than a few people have already put that question to you. Or perhaps you expect to be accosted by such queries in the future. Honestly, I did not ask because I was afraid of being obtrusive and tactless. But to tell the truth, I am dying to know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne'in yüzünde anlık bir gülümseme belirip kayboluyor.{/n} "Anladığım kadarıyla birkaç kişi bu soruyu size yöneltmiş bile. Belki de gelecekte bu tür suallerle karşılaşmayı bekliyorsunuz. Dürüst olmak gerekirse densizlik ve patavatsızlık etmekten korktuğum için sormadım ama açıkçası bilmek için can atıyorum."
